## **Texas Polls**

Texas is the perfect state to apply caution with poll data. 

If you check out FiveThirtyEight's polls for **[Texas](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/texas/)** you'll see that Biden is right behind Donald Trump.

Where the betting odds information excels is taking poll data with a grain of salt. In this case, a Tex Mex margharita with an extra salted rim. 

Texas has voted Republican in every election since 1980.
